import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Navbar.css'; import $ from 'jquery'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default class GrcNavbar extends Component { componentDidMount () { $(document).ready(function () { // executes when HTML-Document is loaded and DOM is ready // breakpoint and up $(window).resize(function () { if ($(window).width() >= 980) { // when you hover a toggle show its dropdown menu $(".navbar .dropdown-toggle").hover(function () { $(this).parent().toggleClass("show"); $(this).parent().find(".dropdown-menu").toggleClass("show"); }); // hide the menu when the mouse leaves the dropdown $(".navbar .dropdown-menu").mouseleave(function () { $(this).removeClass("show"); }); // do something here } }); // document ready }); } render() { return (
